title: Cinderella Man
content: Anyone seen this movie? I just saw it.. Quite good I think. It's about boxing and living in the USA of the Great Depression (era).[url=http://www.keengrid.net/]keengrid.net[/url]

title: Re: Cinderella Man
content: I'm sick of boxing movies, what's the point of making a movie about a boring brutal sport with no redeeming value?[url=http://spatang.com/ck][img]http://spatang.com/ck/bannersm.jpg[/img][/url] [url=http://spatang.com/cosmo][img]http://spatang.com/cosmo/bannersm.jpg[/img][/url] [url=http://spatang.com/nukem][img]http://www.spatang.com/nukem/bannersm.jpg[/img][/url] [img]http://spatang.com/scrobblersig.php[/img]

title: Re: Cinderella Man
content: Yes, true.. But well, it was the first boxing movie I've seen personally.. But I think it had more meaning than the sport. James J. Braddock was more than a boxer to Americans, like something symbol of hope -- or at least I got that kind of picture from the movie.
